feed.title: Paperless-ngx Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.0
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.0

Notable Changes

  • Feature: OAuth2 Gmail and Outlook email support @shamoon (#7866)
  • Feature: Enhanced templating for filename format @stumpylog (#7836)
  • Feature: custom fields queries @shamoon (#7761)
  • Chore: Drop Python 3.9 support @stumpylog (#7774)

Features

  • Enhancement: QoL, auto-focus default select field in custom field dropdown @shamoon (#7961)
  • Change: open not edit @shamoon (#7942)
  • Enhancement: support retain barcode split pages @shamoon (#7912)
  • Enhancement: don't wait for doc API to load preview @shamoon (#7894)
  • Feature: OAuth2 Gmail and Outlook email support @shamoon (#7866)
  • Enhancement: live preview of storage path @shamoon (#7870)
  • Enhancement: management list button improvements @shamoon (#7848)
  • Enhancement: check for mail destination directory, log post-consume errors @mrichtarsky (#7808)
  • Enhancement: workflow overview toggle enable button @shamoon (#7818)
  • Enhancement: disable-able mail rules, add toggle to overview @shamoon (#7810)
  • Feature: auto-clean some invalid pdfs @shamoon (#7651)
  • Feature: page count @s0llvan (#7750)
  • Enhancement: use apt only when needed docker-entrypoint.sh @gawa971 (#7756)
  • Enhancement: set Django SESSION_EXPIRE_AT_BROWSER_CLOSE from PAPERLESS_ACCOUNT_SESSION_REMEMBER @shamoon (#7748)
  • Enhancement: allow setting session cookie age @shamoon (#7743)
  • Feature: copy workflows and mail rules, improve layout @shamoon (#7727)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: remove space before my profile button in dropdown @tooomm (#7963)
  • Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - Handling of Nones when using custom fields in filepath templating @stumpylog (#7933)
  • Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - trigger move and rename after CustomFieldInstance saved @shamoon (#7927)
  • Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - increase field max lengths to accommodate larger tokens @shamoon (#7916)
  • Fix: preserve text linebreaks in doc edit @shamoon (#7908)
  • Fix: only show colon on cards if correspondent and title shown @shamoon (#7893)
  • Fix: Allow ASN values of 0 from barcodes @stumpylog (#7878)
  • Fix: fix auto-dismiss completed tasks on open document @shamoon (#7869)
  • Fix: trigger change warning for saved views with default fields if changed @shamoon (#7865)
  • Fix: hidden canvas element causes scroll bug @shamoon (#7770)
  • Fix: handle overflowing dropdowns on mobile @shamoon (#7758)
  • Fix: chrome scrolling in >= 129 @shamoon (#7738)

Maintenance

  • Enhancement: use apt only when needed docker-entrypoint.sh @gawa971 (#7756)

Dependencies

10 changes - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.0.1 to 1.2.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7830](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7830)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.5.2 to 22.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7829](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7829)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7827](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7827)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-jest-dependencies group in /src-ui with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7826](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7826)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.46.1 to 1.47.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7828](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7828)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#7825](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7825)) - Chore: Upgrades OCRMyPDF to v16 @stumpylog ([#7815](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7815)) - Chore: Upgrades the Docker image to use Python 3.12 @stumpylog ([#7796](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7796)) - Chore: Upgrade Django to 5.1 @stumpylog ([#7795](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7795)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7723](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7723))

All App Changes

43 changes - Change: Use a TextField for the storage path field @stumpylog ([#7967](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7967)) - Fix: remove space before my profile button in dropdown @tooomm ([#7963](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7963)) - Enhancement: QoL, auto-focus default select field in custom field dropdown @shamoon ([#7961](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7961)) - Change: open not edit @shamoon ([#7942](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7942)) - Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - Handling of Nones when using custom fields in filepath templating @stumpylog ([#7933](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7933)) - Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - trigger move and rename after CustomFieldInstance saved @shamoon ([#7927](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7927)) - Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - increase field max lengths to accommodate larger tokens @shamoon ([#7916](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7916)) - Enhancement: support retain barcode split pages @shamoon ([#7912](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7912)) - Fix: preserve text linebreaks in doc edit @shamoon ([#7908](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7908)) - Enhancement: don't wait for doc API to load preview @shamoon ([#7894](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7894)) - Fix: only show colon on cards if correspondent and title shown @shamoon ([#7893](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7893)) - Feature: OAuth2 Gmail and Outlook email support @shamoon ([#7866](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7866)) - Chore: Consolidate workflow logic @shamoon ([#7880](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7880)) - Enhancement: live preview of storage path @shamoon ([#7870](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7870)) - Fix: Allow ASN values of 0 from barcodes @stumpylog ([#7878](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7878)) - Fix: fix auto-dismiss completed tasks on open document @shamoon ([#7869](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7869)) - Fix: trigger change warning for saved views with default fields if changed @shamoon ([#7865](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7865)) - Feature: Enhanced templating for filename format @stumpylog ([#7836](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7836)) - Enhancement: management list button improvements @shamoon ([#7848](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7848)) - Enhancement: check for mail destination directory, log post-consume errors @mrichtarsky ([#7808](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7808)) - Feature: custom fields queries @shamoon ([#7761](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7761)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.0.1 to 1.2.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7830](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7830)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.5.2 to 22.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7829](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7829)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7827](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7827)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-jest-dependencies group in /src-ui with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7826](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7826)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.46.1 to 1.47.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7828](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7828)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#7825](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7825)) - Chore: Upgrades OCRMyPDF to v16 @stumpylog ([#7815](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7815)) - Enhancement: workflow overview toggle enable button @shamoon ([#7818](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7818)) - Enhancement: disable-able mail rules, add toggle to overview @shamoon ([#7810](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7810)) - Chore: Upgrades the Docker image to use Python 3.12 @stumpylog ([#7796](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7796)) - Chore: Upgrade Django to 5.1 @stumpylog ([#7795](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7795)) - entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.1
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.1

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: allow removing dead document links from UI, validate via API @shamoon (#8081)
  • Fix: Make all document related objects soft delete, fix filepath when deleted @shamoon (#8067)
  • Fix: handle uuid fields created under mariadb and Django 4 @shamoon (#8034)
  • Fix / Enhancement: auto-rename document files when select type custom fields are changed @shamoon (#8045)
  • Fix: Update filename correctly if the document is in the trash @stumpylog (#8066)
  • Fix: Handle a special case where removing none marker could result in an absolute path @stumpylog (#8060)
  • Fix: disable custom field signals during import in 2.13.0 @shamoon (#8065)
  • Fix: doc link documents search should exclude null @shamoon (#8064)
  • Fix: fix custom field query empty element removal @shamoon (#8056)
  • Fix: dont try to load PAPERLESS_MODEL_FILE as env from file @shamoon (#8040)
  • Fix: dont include all allauth urls @shamoon (#8010)
  • Fix: oauth settings without base url @shamoon (#8020)
  • Fix / Enhancement: include social accounts and api tokens in export @shamoon (#8016)

Maintenance

  • Fix: Removes whitenoise patches and upgrades it to 6.8.1 @stumpylog (#8079)

All App Changes

12 changes - Fix: allow removing dead document links from UI, validate via API @shamoon ([#8081](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8081)) - Fix: Make all document related objects soft delete, fix filepath when deleted @shamoon ([#8067](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8067)) - Fix: handle uuid fields created under mariadb and Django 4 @shamoon ([#8034](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8034)) - Fix: Update filename correctly if the document is in the trash @stumpylog ([#8066](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8066)) - Fix: Handle a special case where removing none marker could result in an absolute path @stumpylog ([#8060](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8060)) - Fix: disable custom field signals during import in 2.13.0 @shamoon ([#8065](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8065)) - Fix: doc link documents search should exclude null @shamoon ([#8064](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8064)) - Enhancement: auto-rename document files when select type custom fields are changed @shamoon ([#8045](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8045)) - Fix: fix custom field query empty element removal @shamoon ([#8056](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8056)) - Fix: dont include all allauth urls @shamoon ([#8010](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8010)) - Enhancement / fix: include social accounts and api tokens in export @shamoon ([#8016](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8016)) - Fix: oauth settings without base url @shamoon ([#8020](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8020))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.2
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.2

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: remove auth tokens from export @shamoon (#8100)
  • Fix: cf query dropdown styling affecting other components @shamoon (#8095)

All App Changes

2 changes - Fix: remove auth tokens from export @shamoon ([#8100](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8100)) - Fix: cf query dropdown styling affecting other components @shamoon ([#8095](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8095))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.3
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.3

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: fix auto-clean PDFs, create parent dir for storing unmodified original @shamoon (#8157)
  • Fix: correctly handle "exists, false" in custom field query filter @yichi-yang (#8158)
  • Fix: dont use filters for inverted thumbnails in Safari @shamoon (#8121)
  • Fix: use static object for activedisplayfields to prevent changes @shamoon (#8120)
  • Fix: dont invert pdf colors in FF @shamoon (#8110)
  • Fix: make mail account password and refresh token text fields @shamoon (#8107)

Dependencies

8 changes - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#8145](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8145)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.7.4 to 22.8.6 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8148](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8148)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.47.2 to 1.48.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8147](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8147)) - Chore(deps): Bump uuid from 10.0.0 to 11.0.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8146](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8146)) - Chore(deps): Bump tslib from 2.7.0 to 2.8.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8149](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8149)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8150](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8150)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/jest from 29.5.13 to 29.5.14 in /src-ui in the frontend-jest-dependencies group @dependabot ([#8144](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8144)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#8143](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8143))

All App Changes

14 changes - Fix: fix auto-clean PDFs, create parent dir for storing unmodified original @shamoon ([#8157](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8157)) - Fix: correctly handle "exists, false" in custom field query filter @yichi-yang ([#8158](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8158)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#8145](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8145)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.7.4 to 22.8.6 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8148](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8148)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.47.2 to 1.48.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8147](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8147)) - Chore(deps): Bump uuid from 10.0.0 to 11.0.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8146](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8146)) - Chore(deps): Bump tslib from 2.7.0 to 2.8.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8149](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8149)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8150](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8150)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/jest from 29.5.13 to 29.5.14 in /src-ui in the frontend-jest-dependencies group @dependabot ([#8144](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8144)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#8143](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8143)) - Fix: dont use filters for inverted thumbnails in Safari @shamoon ([#8121](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8121)) - Fix: use static object for activedisplayfields to prevent changes @shamoon ([#8120](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8120)) - Fix: dont invert pdf colors in FF @shamoon ([#8110](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8110)) - Fix: make mail account password and refresh token text fields @shamoon ([#8107](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8107))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.4
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.4

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: fix dark mode icon blend mode in 2.13.3 @shamoon (#8166)
  • Fix: fix clipped popup preview in 2.13.3 @shamoon (#8165)

All App Changes

2 changes - Fix: fix dark mode icon blend mode in 2.13.3 @shamoon ([#8166](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8166)) - Fix: fix clipped popup preview in 2.13.3 @shamoon ([#8165](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8165))
